content1: Within my entrepreneurship [Digital Medtools](http://www.digitalmedtoools.com) I will seek to develop specialized software to biomedic researchers to optimize their time and efforts
content4: Included in the service of searching scientific articles for systematic reviews of my entrepreneurship [Digital Medtools](http://www.digitalmedtoools.com). Builds the search strategy or equation for 10 different scientific databases, from a set of previously chosen keywords using the PICO methodology
content7: Included in the service of searching scientific articles for systematic reviews of my entrepreneurship [Digital Medtools](http://www.digitalmedtoools.com). Builds the search strategy or equation for 10 different scientific databases, from a set of previously chosen keywords using the PICO methodology. Enriches the keywords initially chosen in a PICO search through text processing and artificial intelligence algorithms, which allow to know which keywords should be included to improve the search and which should be excluded or prohibited.
